content: Act as a helpful AI assistant
In Julia, Write a function `keep_only_names` which iterates over the provided list of words (`words`) and removes all words that do not start with a capital letter (eg, remove "dog" but keep "Dog").

Here is an implementation in Julia:

```julia
function keep_only_names(words)
    result = []
    for word in words
        if isuppercase(word[1]) # checks if first character of the word is uppercase
            push!(result, word)
        end
    end
    return result
end
```
This function `keep_only_names` will iterate over all the elements in the provided list (`words`). For each element, it checks whether its first letter is an uppercase letter. If true, it adds this word to a new list called `result`. Finally, it returns this new list with only words that start with an uppercase letter.
